The following is a text tagging test(English):
Normal text is used to display normal content;Bold text is used to display emphasis;Italicized text is used to display references, emphasis, or proper nouns;Bold italic text includes both bold and italic text. The underline is used to connect short meaning groups into long meaning groups(Markdown native syntax is not supported, perhaps using HTML tags can achieve it);The strikethrough is used to mark the deleted parts in the review comments. Now that you have a general understanding of the usage of text tags, let’s give it a try.
